Secretary Eric Schmidt ? Eric Schmidt was an early backer of Barack Obama and according to NewsMeat, has given more than$ 230,000 in campaign donations to Democrats, compared with less than$ 20,000 to Republicans. There is a political favor to be returned yet, said Roger Kay , president of Endpoint Technologies. Michael Vick was. At practice Wednesday, Michael Vick loosened up throwing passes to Falcons quarterback Matt Ryan, who is making his first Pro Bowl appearance in his third season and succeeded Michael Vick in Atlanta. Matt is great. The coaching staff is great. We're just having a good time, he said. "I like what they're doing in the offense and it's been easy. Paid Clicks increased 18 percent for the company in the quarter, while cost-per click increased 4 percent. Google said that international revenues totaled$ 4.38 billion, 52 percent of total revenue for the quarter. Our strong performance has been driven by a rapidly growing digital economy, continuous product innovation that benefits both users and advertisers, and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile, said Eric Schmidt , CEO of Google. "These results give us the optimism and confidence to invest heavily in future growth-- investments that will benefit our users, Google and the wider web." The
